Text.Page:
We've an important mission that needs a skilled soldier. We need you to kill {@LinkCreature:41#4002#giant warmasters} in Feral Valley and collect their weapons.

These weapons will prove useful in our diplomatic efforts in the region. Deliver them to Jaebel at Experior Outpost.
Please accept the thanks for the federation, <PCNAME>. We commend your service.
The weapons are a symbol of leadership and courage. Having some will help with our negotiations.
